scripts.create_dump: SET PGPASSWORD=postgres&& pg_dump --schema-only --no-owner --no-acl --disable-triggers --no-comments --no-publications --no-security-labels --no-subscriptions --no-tablespaces --host 127.0.0.1 --username postgres unit-test-demo > dump.sql
scripts.create_test_db: SET PGPASSWORD=postgres&& createdb unit-test-demo-2 && psql -U postgres unit-test-demo-2 < dump.sql && SET NODE_ENV=test&& node server
